p: Collective action is also found to increase empowerment, for instance, by lobbying for environmental issues, integrating environmental values into farming practices, increasing biodiversity, and supporting ecosystem services (Alemu et al., 2018, Orchard et al., 2019). Such cases show that encouraging such synergies can help address issues of power and politics that potentially limit adaptive governance (Karpouzoglou et al., 2016, Orchard et al., 2019).
